verbs.description: < p > [ARGM-TMP: On the eve of their historic and unprecedented summit] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: prepared] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG2: for a meeting that could define the fate of millions , along with their own political futures] , [ARGM-MNR: with Trump forecasting a " nice " outcome and Kim spending the day out of view.</p] >

< p > On the eve of their historic and unprecedented summit , President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un prepared Tuesday for a meeting that [V: could] define the fate of millions , along with their own political futures , with Trump forecasting a " nice " outcome and Kim spending the day out of view.</p >
